valid_articles.Title: Google Search Console performance report now showing me last updated 3 hours ago - are we back?!
valid_articles.Description: Barry Schwartz reports that Google Search Console performance reports are showing updates as of 3 hours ago, indicating a potential recovery from earlier issues.

valid_articles.Title: Still improving but not there yet #GoogleSearchConsole
valid_articles.Description: Barry Schwartz notes that while Google Search Console performance reports are showing improvements, they are not yet fully recovered.

valid_articles.Title: RT by @aleyda: Aleyda Solis (@aleyda) believes that if you're doing SEO right - focusing on brand recognition, user engagement, authority, quality links, and descriptive anchor text - the leak shouldn't change your approach much.
valid_articles.Description: Aleyda Solis emphasizes that a focus on core SEO principles remains crucial regardless of algorithm updates or leaks.

valid_articles.Title: As I said, patience SEOs - patience
valid_articles.Description: Barry Schwartz urges patience from SEOs as Google Search Console performance reports continue to recover.

valid_articles.Title: RT by @glenngabe: The data for this report is still catching up and being reprocessed. In the meantime, you might see a fresh data point with partial data. This is expected with data recoveries, and the partial data will be replaced with final data. Thanks for your patience.
valid_articles.Description: Google Search Central acknowledges that Google Search Console performance report data is still being reprocessed and may show partial data temporarily.

valid_articles.Title: ICYMI Reddit is not blocking Google Search
valid_articles.Description: Barry Schwartz clarifies that rumors of Reddit blocking Google Search from crawling and indexing its content are false.

valid_articles.Title: RT by @aleyda: Google Search Console performance reports are indeed catching up but the fresh data is being reprocessed and is not 100% accurate yet, the fresh data reports are off right now, Google needs a few days to fully reprocess it
valid_articles.Description: Aleyda Solis reiterates that Google Search Console performance reports are still being reprocessed and the fresh data may not be entirely accurate.

valid_articles.Title: Wayback machine shows the normal robots.txt in mid-June. Weird setup from Reddit. :)
valid_articles.Description: Glenn Gabe observes a discrepancy between Reddit's current robots.txt and its historical version in the Wayback Machine.

valid_articles.Title: I imagine this has to do with reprocessing the data that @googlesearchc mentioned here 👇 /ht @rustybrick 🙏
valid_articles.Description: Aleyda Solis speculates that the observed data discrepancies in Google Search Console are related to the ongoing data reprocessing.

valid_articles.Title: Now the Google Search Console shows that it was updated 28 hours ago BUT *ALL* the properties, across all industries I have access to, show a big drop in the "Fresh Data" from Monday 👀 this can't reflect the accurate evolution of their clicks (!) @googlesearchc can you please…
valid_articles.Description: Aleyda Solis points out a significant drop in "Fresh Data" across various properties in Google Search Console, suggesting potential data inaccuracies.

valid_articles.Title: No - Reddit is NOT blocking Google Search and Reddit will continue to outrank you in Google for all your content seroundtable.com/reddit-it-not-… nice investigation work @pedrodias and @ryansiddle
